episode.title: アルカトラズ炎上
Alcatraz in Flames
Das Ende von Battle City
Et la vie reprend son cours
Alcatraz Enjou
episode.summary: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp’s engines are offline! If that isn’t bad enough, Kaiba and Mokuba are nowhere to be found! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無敵デッキマスター 奇跡の方舟
Invincible Deck Master Shinato`s Ark
Verfeindete Brüder (2)
Duel de frères - 2e partie
Muteki Deck Master Kiseki no Hakobune
episode.summary: Noa’s Shinato`s Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noa when Noa has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with? And with every turn that passes, Noa’s secret strategy creeps to the forefront... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海馬家の闇
Kaiba Family`s Darkness
Das Geheimnis der Familie Kaiba
Une amère victoire
Kaiba-ke no Yami
episode.summary: Yugi has defeated Noa... but they still can’t escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings! All the secrets are exposed as Yugi and friends learn that there never was a chance to escape from the virtual world in the first place! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪魔の聖域[デビルズサンクチュアリ]発動!
Fiend`s Sanctuary Activates!
Yugi gegen Marik (2)
Une finale tant attendue - 2e partie
Devil`s Sanctuary Hatsudou!
episode.summary: Marik proves that his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi’s cards can withstand its relentless assault, but a gift from Kaiba may be the key to turn the duel around… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脱出!!
Escape!!
Kaiba gegen Gozaburo (2)
Enterrer le passé - 2e partie
Dasshutsu!!
episode.summary: Kaiba squares off against Gozaburo – and his own demons – to try to finally conquer his painful past, but how can Kaiba defeat Gozaburo’s Exodia Necross which can’t be destroyed by spells, traps, or even attacks? Time is almost up before the missile’s explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バトルロイヤル!
Battle Royal!
Viererduell (2)
Retour à Batailleville - 2e partie
Battle Royale!
episode.summary: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they’re fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘の果てに
After the Fight
Echte Freunde (4)
Un duel pour Maï - 4e partie
Gekitou no Hate ni
episode.summary: Jonouchi and Valon’s battle rages to its roaring climax as Jonouchi attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the very same armor that Valon used against him! But is Jonouchi’s strategy just a pale imitation that’s never as good as the original? And there’s also no rest for the weary – after their duel is over, a new duelist is ready to pick up the pieces and battle the winner! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレイカルコス・ソルジャー
Orichalcos Soldier
Die Vergangenheit lebt
Quand l`histoire se répète
Oreichalkos Soldier
episode.summary: Weakened by his journey into the dark reaches of his heart, Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn’t care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all! Ironheart struggles to help him, but he may pay the ultimate price from a battle that started ten thousand years ago... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名もなき竜 ティマイオス
Nameless Dragon Timaeus
Die Legende der Drachen
La légende des dragons
Na mo Naki Ryuu: Timaios
episode.summary: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! The guardians of both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced, a malevolent menace whose body is miles in length! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の決闘[デュエル]! 遊戯VSラフェール
Duel of Destiny! Yugi vs Rafael
Duell des Schicksals (1)
Aux prises avec le gardien - 1re partie
Unmei no Duel! Yuugi vs Raphael
episode.summary: Not only is Jonouchi’s soul captured, but before this episode is over, another of our loved ones will also lose his or her soul! Also, it’s a rematch between the Pharaoh and Rafael – but this time, the Pharaoh doesn’t have Yugi to protect him! Is the Pharaoh still haunted by his devastating loss at the hands of Rafael? He better pull himself together, for Rafael is taking off the kiddie gloves and unleashing even more powerful guardians than before! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 響きあう魂[ソウル]
Resonating Souls
Echte Freunde (3)
Un duel pour Maï - 3e partie
Hibiki Au Soul
episode.summary: With his scientifically-advanced armor, Valon systematically dismantles Jonouchi’s every move! However, Jonouchi is ready to strike back with his own modern armory as he combines Claw of Hermos with Rocket Warrior to form a never-before-seen cannon with incredibly devastating capabilities! As Jonouchi fires the final obliterating blast, victory is in his grasp... or is there more to Valon’s techno tactics than meets the eye? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光の中を歩め
Walk Inside the Light
Das Ende der Finsternis
Le réveil de la grande créature - 2e partie
Hikari no Naka o Ayume
episode.summary: Grand Dragon Leviathan’s thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide to destroy every town and city on Earth and wash away all traces of humanity! How can Yugi’s simple soul stop the annihilation of the planet from the greatest natural disaster in history? Billions of lives are at stake in the thrilling conclusion where failure means extinction! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: よみがえれ! 第三の竜
Resurrect! The Third Dragon
Geliebter Gegner (2)
Le retour de Maï - 2e partie
Yomigaere! Daisan no Ryuu
episode.summary: Taking advantage of the arcane abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies into devastating combat formations to whittle Jonouchi’s forces into worthless waste! With Jonouchi’s soul moments away from oblivion, is this the last we’ll ever see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Jonouchi as a true duelist? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暴走特急デュエル
Runaway Train Duel
Zug um Zug (1)
Sur la mauvaise voie - 1re partie
Bousou Tokkyuu Duel
episode.summary: Divide and conquer - it’s a train ride to terror! A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz’s new duelists separate Yugi from Jonouchi in order to capture their souls separately! Stuck in the middle of nowhere, can Jonouchi win without Yugi’s support against ranks of ravaging raptors? And can Yugi, in his greatest moment of weakness, pull himself together before he joins the other lost souls by taking the last train to oblivion? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 対決! 二人の遊戯
Battle! Two Yugis
Gegen das eigene Ich
Autodestruction
Taiketsu! Futari no Yuugi
episode.summary: The train derails and plummets into a chasm, leaving Yugi and Anzu totally lost in the Rocky Mountains! Not only do they have to make their way back to civilization, but Yugi is about to embark on his greatest spiritual journey yet when he meets the mysterious Ironheart! Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレイカルコスの三重結界
The Three Seals of Orichalcos
Der dritte Ring
Duel avec Dartz - 4e partie
Oreichalkos no Sanjuu Kekkai
episode.summary: It’s a multi-pronged attack as Dartz adds a third ring to Seal of Orichalcos, stopping the Pharaoh and Kaiba from doing... anything! Even when they manage to attack, Dartz’s Orichalcos Kyutora absorbs all damage! Furthermore, to add insult to injury, Dartz summons the thundering Orichalcos Shunoros to pound the Pharaoh and Kaiba into pancakes! It’s game over, for even the guardian dragons are little match against this battling behemoth! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おとぎの国のレオン
Leon in Fairyland
Duell der Wunderkinder (2)
Un duel de géants - 2e partie
Otogi no Kuni no Leon
episode.summary: Yugi finds Grandpa’s kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? The truth is painful – literally! While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca is starting to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon’s fervent fables! Rebecca must think of a new plan quick or there will be no happy ending! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦の地へ! ダーツVS遊戯&海馬
To the Final Battle! Dartz vs Yugi & Kaiba
Ganz nah dran
Duel avec Dartz - 1re partie
Kessen no Chi e! Dartz vs Yuugi & Kaiba
episode.summary: It’s time for the endgame! After discovering the location of Dartz’s secret base in the middle of the ocean, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all –with the entire navy as their escort! However, Dartz’s island is magically guarded with thundering maelstroms and tornadoes that prevent anyone from approaching! Can they reach Dartz before he resurrects the lethal Grand Dragon Leviathan from its millennial slumber? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遊戯VSラフェール 鉄壁のガーディアンデッキ
Yugi vs Rafael: Impenetrable Guardian Deck
Das Schicksal des Pharao (1)
Le destin du pharaon - 1re partie
Yuugi vs Rafael: Teppeki no Guardian Deck
episode.summary: Isolated on a steep mesa in Death Valley, it’s a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his group of guardian monsters! Rafael’s strong symbiotic relationship with his monsters won’t allow him to let a single one rest six feet under in the graveyard! Will Yugi be quick on the draw and break through his gang of guardians, or will Rafael show that he’s the new sheriff in town? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐のアメルダ大空中決闘[デュエル]
Amelda`s Revenge: Duel in the Sky
Der Horrorflug (1)
Le vol de la peur - 1re partie
Fukushuu no Amelda Dai Kuuchuu Duel
episode.summary: Buckle your safety belts – it’s a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Amelda squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane flying at hundreds of miles per hour! If that wasn’t enough to make Kaiba airsick, the pilot’s missing, the autopilot is malfunctioning and the plummeting plane is on a collision course with a massive mountain! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不死身! ガーディアン・デスサイス
Immortal! Guardian Dreadscythe
Duell des Schicksals (2)
Aux prises avec le gardien - 2e partie
Fujimi! Guardian Deathscythe
episode.summary: Rafael, unlike the Pharaoh, fully knows how to harness the powers of Seal of Orichalcos to his advantage to annihilate the Pharaoh while fortifying his own defenses! But as Rafael embraces the darkness within his heart, Rafael starts breaking his own bond with his monsters by destroying them for the greater cause! Rafael appears to be losing control and creating an opening for the Pharaoh’s counterattack, but Rafael has even more dreadful displays of terror in mind to finish off the Pharaoh... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トゥーンワールドの悪夢
Toon World`s Nightmare
Déjà-vu (1)
Un air de déjà vu - 1re partie
Toon World no Akumu
episode.summary: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Wielding his newest whacked-out Toon terrors, Pegasus is ready to repeat his previous victory against Kaiba! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus’s strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 熱闘! レベッカVSヴィヴィアン
Fierce Fight! Rebecca vs Vivian
Das reinste Kinderspiel!
Championne en herbe
Nettou! Rebecca vs Vivian
episode.summary: It’s the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong! However, there’s more at stake than just winning the duel – Yugi’s heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not! At the other end of Kaiba Land, a couple of familiar former champions sneak into the tournament, only to find themselves facing a threat that sends shockwaves throughout all the competitors! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海馬乱入! グランプリ決勝戦
Kaiba Steps In! Grand Prix Finals
Vorteil für Zigfried (1)
Un défi inattendu - 1re partie
Kaiba Rannyuu! Grand Prix Kesshousen
episode.summary: It’s Sieg vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel! Why would Kaiba interfere in his own tournament? The answers may lie in the very origins of KaibaCorp and the invention of the Duel Disk! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 引きさかれた魂
Torn Soul
Im Bannkreis des Steins
Le jugement des pierres
Hikisakareta Tamashii
episode.summary: Dartz has captured Yugi’s soul! Having betrayed his dearest friend, the Pharaoh sinks into the darkest depths of despair and loses his will to save the world! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動きだした陰謀
The Scheme Begins
Der ungebetene Gast (2)
L`homme contre la machine
Ugokidashita Inbou
episode.summary: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer – a calculating contraption programmed with the skills of the world’s top duelists! Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards to create a devastating deck, how can Yugi win when he’s forced to use an amateur deck that barely contains any spell or trap cards? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 攻撃力∞[むげんだい]蛇神[じゃしん]ゲー
Infinite Attack Points Divine Serpent Geh
Die Wiederauferstehung von Orichalcos
Duel avec Dartz - 6e partie
Kougekiryoku Mugendai Jashin Ge
episode.summary: Dartz calls forth Divine Serpent Geh, a sinister snake with infinite attack points! Yugi counters by joining the three legendary dragon knights into the mighty Timaeus the Knight of Destiny, but is that enough to combat a monster with limitless strength? As the great forces clash, the gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦女神[ワルキューレ]VS青眼の白龍[ブルーアイズ・ホワイトドラゴン]
Valkyrie vs Blue-Eyes White Dragon
Vorteil für Zigfried (2)
Un défi inattendu - 2e partie
Valkyrie vs Blue Eyes White Dragon
episode.summary: It’s a battle between Siegs’s Valkyries and Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon! Siegs quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba’s monsters before he can even draw them! With Siegs’s army growing in strength while Kaiba’s forces falter, Siegs is unstoppable! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天才少女[レベッカ]VS天才少年[レオン]
Rebecca vs Leon: Genius vs Genius
Duell der Wunderkinder (1)
Un duel de géants - 1re partie
Rebecca vs Leon
episode.summary: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it’s a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction! Rebecca is counting on Yugi to cheer and support her, but Yugi has bigger problems to ponder – Grandpa is missing! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 城之内VSジーク華麗なる決闘[デュエル]
Jonouchi vs Sieg: Beautiful Duel
Gegen die Zeit (1)
Tout feu tout flamme - 1re partie
Jounouchi vs Jeek: Karei Naru Duel
episode.summary: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship! Unfortunately for Jonouchi, his next opponent is Sieg Lloyd, the dashing duelist who defeated both Haga and Ryuzaki in one turn! Things may be bad for Jonouchi, but Kaiba has his hands full when all the rides in Kaiba Land go haywire! Can Kaiba find out who’s behind all the sabotages before the tournament is ruined? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アトランティスの悲劇
Tragedy of Atlantis
Zeit für das ultimative Duell!
Duel avec Dartz - 2e partie
Atlantis no Higeki
episode.summary: Dartz’s deepest secrets are finally revealed – including the fact that he’s over 10,000 years old! How can he still be alive after many millennia? How did ancient Atlantis sink to the bottom of the sea? And why does Dartz really want to destroy the Pharaoh? As the answers to the most puzzling questions are exposed, the Pharaoh and Kaiba realize just how much is at stake in this ultimate duel against the terror thousands of years in the making! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ティマイオス発動せず
Timaeus Fails to Activate
Zug um Zug (3)
Sur la mauvaise voie - 3e partie
Timaios Hatsudousezu
episode.summary: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Haga’s insect invasion! Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts! As for Jonouchi, Ryuzaki’s deadly dinos have Jonouchi struggling to find a monster that has even the remotest chance of withstanding their relentless assault! Will Jonouchi realize that a certain iron knight, weighed down by his cumbersome armor, hasn’t unleashed his full power yet before he’s squashed into Jurassic juice? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 囚われのミラーナイト
Captured Mirror Knights
Die Spiegelritter
Duel avec Dartz - 3e partie
Toraware no Mirror Knight
episode.summary: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba! How can the Pharaoh duel when attacking Dartz may force him to attack Yugi? Does he dare risk eliminating his best friend forever? Our heroes better beware, for this is the least of Dartz’s malevolent manipulations as his dark designs come to light! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 苦い勝利
Bitter Victory
Echte Freunde (5)
Un duel pour Maï - 5e partie
Nigai Shouri
episode.summary: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Jonouchi can barely stand up, much less duel! However, he has no time to rest before he faces a fresh and determined Mai! Both their souls are once again on the line inside Seal of Orichalcos, but unlike last time, this duel is NOT going to end in a draw! Can Jonouchi make it two victories in a row, even if it means trapping Mai’s soul away forever? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心の闇を撃て!
Strike the Heart`s Darkness!
Duell des Schicksals (3)
Aux prises avec le gardien - 3e partie
Kokoro no Yami o Ute!
episode.summary: From the depths of darkness, Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated... for it resurrects automatically! As the invincible sickled stalker shaves off the Pharaoh’s life points every turn, how can the Pharaoh survive this onerous onslaught, much less rescue Rafael from the darkness feasting on his soul? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァロン始動! 謎のアーマーデッキ
Valon on the Move! Mysterious Armor Deck
Das Panzerdeck
Un jeu d`armure
Valon Shidou! Nazo no Armour Deck
episode.summary: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Ryuji and Rebecca! Not only is it a two-on-one handicap match, but Valon’s armor monsters have zero attack points! All the cards appear to be on Ryuji and Rebecca’s side, but when there’s more to the armor than meets the eye, who really has the advantage? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デュエルキング決定戦 遊戯VSレオン
Duel King Decider Match: Yugi vs Leon
Finstere Geheimnisse (1)
Secrets de famille - 1re partie
Duel King Ketteisen: Yuugi vs Leon
episode.summary: It’s Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! However, something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown! Sieg’s greatest revenge is about to commence as his real master plan is unleashed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍びよるダーツの影
Dartz`s Shadow Approaches
In der Höhle des Löwen
La prise de contrôle
Shinobiyoru Dartz no Kage
episode.summary: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! The timing couldn’t be any worse - the only supercomputer in the world that can decipher the Atlantean hieroglyphics is housed within the four walls of KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi’s help, break into his own company which he’s protected with the latest in security technology? Not only is the company built to punish every unwanted intruder, but vicious monsters are hot on their tail, ready to feast on them! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天空の要塞 ジグラート
Air Fortress Ziggurat
Der Horrorflug (2)
Le vol de la peur - 2e partie
Tenkuu no Yousai Ziggurat
episode.summary: Amelda dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat, a mechanical menace that’s not only armed with countless cannons but can also summon a battalion of Robot Tokens! How can Kaiba defeat an endless rank of robots, much less a monster the size of the plane itself? He’s running out of time to think of a plan - the plane is minutes away from crashing! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フルアーマー・グラビテーション
Full Armor Gravitation
Echte Freunde (2)
Un duel pour Maï - 2e partie
Full Armor Gravitation
episode.summary: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon is pummeling Jonouchi with punishing punches! Valon’s helmet also feeds him crucial data on Jonouchi’s monsters, allowing Valon to analyze and assess the optimum strategy to render Jonouchi’s forces obsolete! Can Jonouchi outthink the computer before he’s downsized into oblivion? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドーマの真実
The Truth About Doma
Das Schicksal des Pharao (2)
Le destin du pharaon - 2e partie
Doma no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: Dartz’s master plan is finally revealed, and capturing Yugi’s soul is the catalyst to reset the very essence of history! With humanity on the line, Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it’s not enough to crack Rafael’s defense of gargantuan guardians, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: KCグランプリ開幕
KC Grand Prix Begins
Der ungebetene Gast (1)
Un nouveau défi
KC Grand Prix Kaimaku
episode.summary: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they’re about to face their biggest challenge yet – How will they get home when they have no money?! Fortunately, Kaiba has a plan... but there’s a catch! It’s time for the KC Grand Championship! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 城之内VSマスク・ザ・ロック
Jonouchi vs Mask the Rock
Lasst die Spiele beginnen! (1)
Que le tournoi commence - 1re partie
Jounouchi vs Mask the Rock
episode.summary: It’s the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world’s greatest duelists are all vying for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games! There’s no time for Jonouchi to revel in the festivities, for he’s in the first match against the not-so-mysterious masked duelist Mask the Rock! But when Jonouchi forgets that it’s time to duel, if he doesn’t reach the duel arena in time, he’s disqualified! Will Jonouchi’s bonehead move cost him the tournament before he even draws his first card? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇に堕ちた舞
Mai Who Fell into Darkness
Geliebter Gegner (1)
Le retour de Maï - 1re partie
Yami ni Ochita Mai
episode.summary: Can this be?! Mai has joined the enemy! Wielding the sinister sorcery of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai unequivocally calculates to trap Jonouchi’s soul for Dartz’s malevolent master plan! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! 城之内VS[ヴァーサス]ヴァロン
Clash! Jonouchi vs Valon
Echte Freunde (1)
Un duel pour Maï - 1re partie
Gekitotsu! Jounouchi vs Valon
episode.summary: Dartz launches the final phase of his plan by having his minions of Orichalcos Soldiers attack all around the world, leaving Yugi and gang with no one left to trust! With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Jonouchi from his friends for a final showdown with Mai’s heart on the line! How can Joey beat Valon by himself when both Ryuji and Rebecca couldn’t even leave a dent in Valon’s armor? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ペガサスからの招待状
Pegasus`s Invitation
Der Schöpfer kehrt zurück
Le retour des créateurs
Pegasus kara no Shoutaijou
episode.summary: Confusion abound when enemies become friends... and friends become enemies! Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they’re asked for help from a one-eyed former foe! But will they get to him in time, for he is being watched by a “friend” who may have joined the dark side... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目覚めよ! クリティウス
Awaken! Critias
Déjà-vu (2)
Un air de déjà vu - 2e partie
Mezame yo! Kritias
episode.summary: Not only does Amelda’s mighty fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba’s monsters! With Amelda’s army growing while Kaiba’s squad whittles into nothing, will Amelda get his seething revenge, or will Kaiba be recognized as a true duelist and get aid from the monster domain? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 予期せぬ敵
Unexpected Enemy
Freund oder Feind?
Un ennemi inattendu
Yokisenu Teki
episode.summary: On the way to Industrial Illusions, Yugi and friends are ambushed by a band of motorcycle thugs - until their favorite friend soars to the rescue on the wings of her Harpie Lady! Mai’s back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 遊戯の中の闇 ティマイオス消滅
Darkness Inside Yugi: Timaeus Vanishes
Das Schicksal des Pharao (3)
Le destin du pharaon - 3e partie
Yuugi no Naka no Yami: Timaios Shoumetsu
episode.summary: Using the awesome abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael’s guardians into garbage... but he’s also slowly succumbing to the card’s evil influence! As darkness grows within his heart, Yugi’s monsters turn sinister! Yugi will do anything to win, including indiscriminately forsaking his precious monsters, but the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: モンスター抹殺の女神
Goddess of Monster Destruction
Gegen die Zeit (2)
Tout feu tout flamme - 2e partie
Monster Massatsu no Megami
episode.summary: Sieg activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Haga and Ryuzaki at the same time! If that one card can defeat two duelists instantly, what chance does Jonouchi have all by himself? Jonouchi better have one last card to turn this duel around before Sieg’s Valkyries carry him off to Valhalla! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: よみがえれ! 伝説の三騎士
Resurrect! The Three Legendary Knights
Eine letzte Hoffnung
Duel avec Dartz - 5e partie
Yomigaere! Densetsu no Sankishi
episode.summary: Kaiba’s soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos! Will his friends reach out from the beyond to give him one last fighting chance before the Pharaoh sinks into the inescapable depths of despair? For in the darkest time of need, hope still resides among the legendary dragons as they reveal their true identities... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幻の古代竜[エンシェント・ドラゴン]
The Illusory Ancient Dragon
Lasst die Spiele beginnen! (2)
Que le tournoi commence - 2e partie
Maboroshi no Ancient Dragon
episode.summary: Mysteries abound! How does Mask the Rock know all of Jonouchi’s strategies? How can Jonouchi stop the masked master when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery is: How can Jonouchi not know who Mask the Rock is? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パワーアップデッキ! 羽蛾&竜崎
Power Up Deck! Haga & Ryuzaki
Zug um Zug (2)
Sur la mauvaise voie - 2e partie
Power Up Deck! Haga & Ryuuzaki
episode.summary: While Haga sneakily infests and genetically manipulates Yugi’s monsters to metamorphose them into crude creepy crawlers, Ryuzaki’s prehistoric predators take a more forceful approach and run roughshod over Jonouchi’s forces! Nothing will stop Haga and Ryuzaki from quenching their thirst for revenge that’s been brewing since Battle City by capturing Yugi and Jonouchi’s souls! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ターゲットは名もなき王[ファラオ]
The Target Is the Nameless Pharaoh
Die falsche Geisel
Le défi
Target wa Na mo Naki Pharaoh
episode.summary: Professor Hopkins has discovered startling connections between the world’s chaotic conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization! However, before he can reveal his findings to Yugi, he’s kidnapped by Rafael! Yugi’s on the trail, but is this an elaborate plan to trap the Pharaoh? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヘルモスの奇跡
Hermos`s Miracle
Geliebter Gegner (3)
Le retour de Maï - 3e partie
Hermos no Kiseki
episode.summary: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Jonouchi transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Dazed and confused, can Jonouchi master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai’s Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds? And even if Jonouchi wins, Mai’s soul will be sent into the ether! It’s a no-win situation! Source: crunchyroll
